Andi : Angie, may i borrow your pen? I left mine in my room.

Angie : I didn't bring mine, either. I'M SORRY.

related_questions.question:
Keias/Semester    Hari/Tanggal
: VIII / II
: Sabtu, 12 Juni 2021
Petunjuk
: Berilah tando Silang) pada salah satu alternatif jawaban yang paling tepat!
Read the text below to answer no 1-4 !
Holiday in Tanjung Toda Beach
When Idul Fitri holiday, after visiting my parent at Sulamu, Kupang Regency, I and my family went to Tanjung
Toda Beach to refresh our mind after the long time of work. It's rarely to take a vacation because I'm very busy.
The way to Tanjung Toda beach is quite good, and the view is really beautiful. On our left and right is full of fields
and many coconut trees along the way. But when we nearly arrived, there was a bad road so we hardly to get in into the
beach. I guess this was because the local government not pay enough attention to build the road yet, so it is hard for
people who want to go to the beach. Then we just take a walk to the beach because it was not far Fortunately, the weather
was not too hot on that day,
After we an ived, the beach was so crowded. But we still enjoyed the time by took pictures, swimming, playing
sand, and go around the beach by boat. We stay overnight in the tent that we have brought.
We got up so early in the morning that we could enjoy sunrise landscape at the beach. My cousin playing with
white sand and I took a picture of him.
A day at Tanjung Toda beach felt so short, we were quite tired for playing a whole day, but we were very happy.
1. The recount text is a text that....
A. Telling some funnies story.
B. Telling a story to entertain the readers.
XRetells past events in the order the happened.
D. Tells many events that will be happen in the future.
.
2. The Generic structure of the recount text are:...
1).
2).
3). ....
True False
3. Below are the purpose of the recount text!
No
Statement
1. Write in the present tense
2. Use action words (e.g. helped crutched).
3. Focus on generals by using the word "you" or
"they"
4. Use some words which indicate when(e.g. after
lunch); where the events took place (e.g, in the
shed)
4 The best arrangement of these numbled sentences to be a good recount testis​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Baca teks di bawah ini untuk menjawab tidak 1-4!

Liburan di pantai Tanjung Toda

Ketika liburan Idul Fitri, setelah mengunjungi orang tua saya di Sulamu, Regency Kupang, saya dan keluarga saya pergi ke Tanjung

Toda Beach untuk menyegarkan pikiran kita setelah lama bekerja. Ini jarang untuk mengambil liburan karena aku sangat sibuk.

Jalan ke pantai Tanjung yang cukup bagus, dan pemandangannya benar-benar indah. Di sebelah kiri dan kanan kami penuh dengan bidang

Dan banyak pohon kelapa sepanjang jalan. Tapi ketika kami hampir tiba, ada jalan yang buruk sehingga kami hampir tidak bisa masuk ke dalam

Pantai. Saya kira ini karena pemerintah setempat tidak membayar cukup perhatian untuk membangun jalan belum, sehingga sulit untuk

Orang yang ingin pergi ke pantai. Kemudian kami hanya berjalan-jalan ke pantai karena tidak jauh untungnya, cuaca

Tidak terlalu panas pada hari itu,

Setelah kita terjun, pantai begitu ramai. Tapi kami masih menikmati waktu dengan mengambil gambar, berenang, bermain

Pasir, dan pergi di sekitar pantai dengan perahu. Kami menginap di tenda yang kami bawa.

Kami bangun pagi-pagi sekali sehingga kami dapat menikmati pemandangan matahari terbit di pantai. Sepupu saya bermain dengan

Pasir putih dan aku mengambil fotonya.

Sehari di pantai Tanjung Tanjung terasa sangat singkat, kami cukup lelah bermain sepanjang hari, tetapi kami sangat bahagia.

Gudang)

related_questions.question:
Bantuin gua dong plisss, yang ngerti dan pinter Bahasa Inggris nya    How Day and Night Happen

In this world, as we already know when the sunlight shines, we all call it a day. and when there's no sunlight, we all call it a night. but how it happens?

day happens when the sun is above us or there's a sunlight. but it's not all part of the Earth that is being hitten by the sunlight. and the part of earth that isn't being hitten by the sun, we call it a night. actually, it's not the sun that's spinning around the earth as we usually see. but, it is the earth that spins around the sun.

so, part of earth that's facing the sun, there's a day. meanwhile, the part of earth that's not facing the sun, there's a night.

1. Identify the generic structure of the text
2. Write the sentence using 
a. Present simple
b. Conjunction
c. Passive​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Bagaimana Siang dan Malam Terjadi

Di dunia ini, seperti yang sudah kita ketahui kapan sinar matahari bersinar, kita semua menyebutnya sehari. dan ketika tidak ada sinar matahari, kita semua menyebutnya malam. tapi bagaimana itu terjadi?

hari terjadi ketika matahari berada di atas kita atau ada sinar matahari. tapi tidak semua bagian bumi yang terkena sinar matahari. dan bagian bumi yang tidak terkena matahari, kita sebut malam. sebenarnya bukan matahari yang berputar mengelilingi bumi seperti yang biasa kita lihat. tapi, itu adalah bumi yang berputar mengelilingi matahari.

jadi, bagian bumi yang menghadap matahari, ada hari. sedangkan bagian bumi yang tidak menghadap matahari adalah malam.

so, part of earth that's facing the sun, there's a day. meanwhile, the part of earth that's not facing the sun, there's a night.
